ovdesc.p: Parameter table to select portfolios for which breakdown facility is availed. Only the portfolios identified with this set up will have various breakdown entities like flow capture and historic breakdown information recorded.

GT LT UNLIKE.

The ID of AM.BREAKDOWN.SELECT should be a valid company id.
Valid company id.
Indicates if the breakdown facility is applicable to all or only for selected portfolios.
ALL - The breakdown facility is available for all the portfolios under the given company.
SELECTED - The user can specify the list of portoflios for which the breakdown facility is available. The portfolios are recorded manually in the Field SEL.PORTFOLIO.
SELECTED.LIST - Allows the user to specify a Dynamic selection criteria to select the list of portfolios availing breakdown facility .
Any of three Options.
Portfolio's for which Breakdown facility is available. Activated when BREAK.SELECT is set to SELECTED
